===========
 pythoneon 
===========

'pythoneon' is a Python library for:

- producing sounds,
- organizing sounds in time and space.

With 'pythoneon' one can write (compose) electronic music in a
traditional western manner.

Please, read the files:
LIS_MOI.txt
COPYING.txt
UTILISATION.txt
LICENSE.txt
